comments.body: Sweet coins. I'm curious to see how sendtric's latest timer works. It's failed for me a few times so I ditched it for the usual one everyone uses.Pro tip. Start your auction at face value(s) otherwise just do a wts..Â  Nobody wants to bid that high out the gate if that makes sense.. No fun ... Hell if you set it to zero, you'd still get the first bid at least at .02, or at least a fun/good fight at the ending...
